Home.ExperienceText: Cinepolis has extended the traditional cinema experience to a broader world of film and entertainment, and offers its audience maximum flexibility in the choice of when, where, and how to enjoy its program. Cinepolis wants to give visitors 'the ultimate movie experience' and, to that end, combines a state-of-the-art cinema infrastructure with a tailor-made offering for various target groups.

Locations.Title: Locations
Locations.Subtitle: Select one of our locations in the menu to see its details!

Screenings.Title: Screenings
Screenings.Subtitle: Select a date in order to see the movies airing at that date!

Search.Title: Search
Search.Subtitle: You can search for a screening by movie title, genre, location or date.

Buy.Subtitle1: You are about to buy tickets for the following movie.
Buy.Subtitle2: Select the amount of tickets and their price category.
